title: [Large-scale] Mobile Language Proficiency Enhancement Program Using Responsive Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and fundamental digital device usage skills
context.additional_context: Adult learners requiring flexible support in smartphone-centric, limited-technology environments, performing project-based assessments centered on real-life language tasks.

learning_goals: Learners can utilize advanced language expressions in five types of daily conversation situations with 80% accuracy through mobile-based microlearning within one week.
Learners receive personalized feedback at least three times, tailored to their individual learning progress via a responsive blended learning model, and apply it to task performance.
Learners complete one language project using collaboration tools (mobile messenger) with peer learners and submit it according to evaluation criteria.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
